name: WEUSD
description: PicWe is a decentralized cross-chain DeFi and RWA (Real-World Asset) platform that enables seamless swapping and investment without the need for traditional bridges. Our stablecoin, $WEUSD, is pegged 1:1 to the U.S. dollar, serving as a stable value medium for transactions, liquidity provision, and RWA investments. Through PicWeâ€™s proprietary CATM (Chain Abstraction Transaction Model), users can mint, bridge, and use WEUSD efficiently and securely across multiple blockchains.
